events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on your skills and experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview went well, demonstrating strong fundamental software engineering knowledge and communication skills.
You responded promptly with your availability for the next step in our technical interview process, showing enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next Monday. Please prepare for questions related to coding, algorithms, and system design.
